listing.listing_description:
A vibrant blue gate sets the stage for mesmerizing sea views, photogenic sunsets, unique water features and stylish tropical living straight out of a design magazine. Entering through the courtyard, a pebbled tropical stream flows invitingly around the upper level. Walk through the blue front door and a panoramic vision in brilliant greens and blues flows all the way from the turquoise pool to the sea and beyond to the horizon. The scene is dramatic, magical and serene.

Open, airy interior and exterior rooms, with high vaulted ceilings and creamy stone floors, blend seamlessly to create a chicly contemporary, comfortable space. Expansive floor to ceiling glass walls and sliding glass doors open wide to the sea view, the upper pool and spacious outdoor terraces for al fresco dining and lounging. Soft white walls, colorful modern art and accessories plus sleek furniture in off-white and taupe are complemented by dark woods for an inviting and relaxing style. Off the dining area, facing the sea, is a modern, open kitchen in white, grey, steel and black granite.

The four bedrooms are housed in two wings. Every bedroom is equal size with sea and lower pool views. The interiors are sleek and tranquil in whites and neutrals accented with color pops; each room distinctive in blue, turquoise, brown and red. The beautiful spa style marble and stone bathrooms feature spacious walk in showers with sea and pool views; one has a private outdoor shower.

3 bedrooms are off the main space. The upper bedroom terrace has views of the sea and beautiful lower pool. Downstairs are two pool level bedrooms each with views, private terraces and ladders so you can dip in the pool from your room. The fourth bedroom, with direct lower pool access, is across the upper level “river” and downstairs with its own private entry just off the upper level pool.

Although very secluded, you are very close to amenities. Walk to Plum Beach. 10 minute drive brings you to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case; 30 to Philipsburg’s shopping haven and a mere 10 to the airport.

listing.listing_description:
Like its namesake, Black Pearl is a gorgeous and unique property that can accommodate both family vacations and couple’s getaways with ease. The brand-new four-bedroom villa is set on a hillside near Marigot Bay and has unforgettable views of the Grand Cul de Sac lagoon and the ocean beyond. Spend your stay basking in the Caribbean sunshine by the private pool or exploring the nearby beaches.

Though the villa’s living spaces are comfortably air-conditioned, you’ll want to step outside to the terrace, which has covered sitting and dining areas and a sunny lounge area around the heated infinity pool. A gas barbecue makes it easy to try local specialties. After a day at the beach, turn on the satellite television and sound system or post your pictures via Wi-Fi.

The interiors of Black Pearl have cool, contemporary lines that keep the focus on the gorgeous ocean views. The sleek great room is almost entirely white, save its pale wood floors and a playful orange cabinet, creating a clean, fresh feel. A long white sectional is a welcoming spot in the sitting area, and minimalist flat-fronted cabinets conceal everything you’ll need in the fully equipped kitchen.

All four bedrooms at Black Pearl have queen beds, en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning; for added privacy, there are two on the main floor and two on the lower level. The two bedrooms on the main floor have satellite television and ocean views, and one of the bedrooms on the lower level has satellite television as well. Like the common areas, the bedrooms have white walls and bedding and clean-lined furniture for a restful, minimalist vibe.

Thanks to the villa’s location near Marigot Bay, it’s easy to try out beaches until you find the perfect one. It’s just under 600 meters to Marigot Beach, a 5-minute drive to Lorient Beach, 2.9 km to Petit Cul de Sac Beach, just over 4.4 km to Nikki Beach, 5 km to St Jean Beach and Saline Beach and 8.5 km to Gouverneur Beach. In the evenings, head to Gustavia, a 6.5 km drive away, for shopping and dining, and when it’s time to leave, Gustaf III Airport is a 4.2 km drive from the villa.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Etoile de Mer sits at the edge of the sea in the private village of Shore Point right on the French/Dutch Border. Like an exquisite microcosm of a gleaming white Greek island, the villas of Shore Point are individual, elegant gems within a luxurious gated community. The entrance to Etoile de Mer is framed by lush tropical bushes and classic white columns. An elegant frosted glass door opens to the dramatic descending marble staircase that transports you to the main living area and a stunning view of the blue sky, Caribbean Sea and the outer islands.

The contemporary interiors, with tumbled travertine floors, flow through stunning glass and wood sliding doors right onto a spacious covered terrace and deck. The wraparound space is perfect for outdoor dining and lounging. Graceful arches and columns draw your eye to the deep blue pool that seems to flow straight to the sea.

The interior décor blends tropical tones and patterns with teak woods accents; elegant and comfortable. Colorful local art adorns the walls throughout the villa. The open plan living area features a high-end kitchen with luxury appliances, beautiful woods and stainless steel. The indoor dining area is between the kitchen and the view. The large main living area combines lounging and media spaces with a powder room is conveniently located on the first floor.

The four equal size bedrooms have king size beds, sea views, private outdoor seating areas and beautiful en suite bathrooms. Each room features a romantic iron canopy bed and soft white color scheme accented with tropical prints. Each of the spa style bathroom with walk in showers; the décor combines woods, glass, tiles and river stones with sleek brushed chrome fixtures. One bathroom has a large soaking tub.

Although private, you are very close to amenities. 3 minutes to Puerto Cupecoy with a terrific little gourmet market, wonderful restaurants and stunning views. In 5 minutes you reach the airport, 10 minutes to the charming French capital of Marigot and about 30 minutes to either Grand Case or Phillipsburg.

_ Please Note: The size and nature of Cupecoy Beach may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns. Renters are encouraged to explore Mullet Bay Beach as an alternative only a 2 minute drive from the villa.  _

listing.listing_description:
World-class golf, gorgeous beachfront, and some of the most exciting nightlife on the planet at your doorstep at Golf Villa 22. Overlooking the tenth hole of the Dunes Course, this luxurious four bedroom is the perfect home base for an unforgettable golf vacation. Located within the Diamante Resort, one of the World’s most prestigious golf destinations, you'll have quick and easy access to courses designed by Tiger Woods and Davis Love III, as well as numerous other courses in the surrounding area. And, Golf Villa is just a few kilometers from the always exciting tourism hot spot, Cabo San Lucas.

Golf Villa 22’s spacious interior is decorated with stately furniture, elegant stonework, and the highest end electronics. You and your group will surely appreciate the villa’s social atmosphere, especially when the room-length sliding doors are open to the terrace. Inside and out, Golf Villa was made to host. With barrier-free access, the living room, swimming pool terrace, wet bar, and alfresco dining set all flow into one and other, enhancing the social vibes. Get ready for exciting nights gathered around the fire pit, watching the big game at the wet bar, and soaking up the Cabo sun at Golf Villa 22.

On the Diamante Resort, you’ll have shared access to their three scenic golf courses, the ten-acre Crystal Lagoon swimming pool, their fitness center, spa, and several great bars and restaurants. The villa comes with an on-resort shuttle service, and plenty of other helpful amenities.

After you’ve played a round or two on all three of Diamante’s incredible golf courses, give yourself a little rest and relaxation at one of Cabo’s beautiful beachfront areas. Medano and Lover’s Beach are two of the most popular beaches in the country, both about fifteen kilometers from home. You’ll find plenty of exciting nightlife, dining, and shopping opportunities are Cabo San Lucas’ downtown beach areas. If you’d prefer something more laid-back, visit San Jose Del Cabo, which features a vibrant arts and culture scene, with lots of galleries, museums, and fine dining in and around the towns Main Square.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Throw your cares to the Caribbean breeze at La Pergola. This luxury vacation rental invites you to leave the everyday behind and enjoy five-star amenities and an incredible view over St. Martin’s Long Bay. The four-bedroom property is the perfect setting for a relaxed holiday with up to eight friends and family members.

The villa opens to a heated infinity pool that stretches toward the ocean and spills over into a smaller spa-style pool. It’s surrounded by a sunny terrace with plenty of loungers, a barbecue, and shaded al-fresco living and dining areas that will tempt you to linger outdoors from the gorgeous sunrise views to the fascinating stargazing. 

The bright, open interiors of La Pergola are a charming mix of Caribbean architecture and Moroccan touches—think white-paneled vaulted ceilings and a stretch of glass doors paired with terracotta tile floors in the open-plan great room. There are two sitting areas separated by a dining area, and the fully equipped kitchen connects to the space through a convenient breakfast bar.

Each of the villa’s four bedrooms is a private retreat all its own with a king bed, en-suite bathroom and ceiling fan, the property can be rented with all four bedrooms for a group getaway, or with two or three bedrooms for a few couples or even an indulgent honeymoon.

La Pergola is located in the exclusive Terres Basses neighborhood in the Hillside area of St. Martin, offering guests postcard-worthy views while still being only a 10-minute drive from the island’s capital, Marigot. Browse the boutiques, sample local cuisine in the oceanfront cafés, or pick up a few local ingredients in the nearby grocery store to try out on your own.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This newly built two-level home is one of our must-visit St. Barts villas thanks to its excellent sea views and spacious, private terrace. Nestled in the Caribbean Sea, the island of St. Barts is known for luxury and its white sand beaches that attract the rich and famous from around the world, and you’ll get to experience all of that during your stay.

Take in panoramic views of the bay of Petit Cul de Sac, and the sea beyond, from the privacy of the villa’s large deck. Choose from one of the lounge chaises to sip on a cool drink and soak in the island’s sun. The villa also features an outdoor pool—the best way to cool off on a warm day. In the evenings, fire up the barbecue for an alfresco meal on the dining table with seating for six under the covered terrace.

Inside, the decor is minimalist and modern with soft neutral tones, white furnishings and wooden accents. The spacious living room features a plush sofa as well as a flatscreen television, and opens up to the terrace. The nearby kitchen is fully equipped with all the appliances you need to put together a home-cooked meal.

La Magnifica features two bedrooms on different floors that can comfortably sleep up to four guests. The master bedroom features a king-sized bed, air conditioning, private en-suite bathroom, flatscreen television and views of the sea as well as access to the terrace. The second bedroom offers similar perks: a king-sized bed, air conditioning, en-suite bathroom and flatscreen television.

Take advantage of the nearby beaches of Grand Cul de Sac and Petit Cul de Sac, both offer excellent swimming opportunities as well as sunbathing spots on white sand. A 7.3 km drive brings you to the bustling capital, Gustavia, home to the best boutique shopping, restaurants and spas the island has to offer.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Construction Note: Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please contact us for further details.

Enchanting views, exciting activities and five-star accommodations await at Casa Puesta del Sol. With a name that means ‘sunset’ in Spanish, the luxury villa delivers with panoramas of three different bays and the Costa Rican rainforest. A location within the exclusive Los Suenos resort gives guests access to shared amenities like a marina and beach club, while five bedrooms can host the whole family or a group of friends.

During your stay, be sure to explore the resort’s beach club, marina, restaurants and bars; you can also play a round on the golf course at extra cost. There are also rewards to staying ‘home’ at the private villa; the house opens to a covered loggia with a dining area from which you can step directly into the infinity pool and hot tub, or cross to a sunny terrace with its own lounge area. (There’s even a shallow section of the pool where you can park a lounge chair.) Flip on the villa’s sound system to set the mood, or share vacation photos with friends back at home via Wi-Fi.

Incredible views pair with elegant furnishings to create an unforgettable ambience in this hillside Costa Rica rental home. The center of the house is a two-story atrium with a sweeping staircase, wrought-iron railings and a classic black and white tile floor. The space opens to generous rooms with large windows, from the comfortable living room to a formal dining room with a painted ceiling motif and European-style built-in china cabinet. The fully equipped kitchen features a breakfast bar set on an angle, so cooks working at the island have a view of the water.

Each of the five bedrooms at Casa Puesta del Sol has an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet. There are two bedrooms with king beds (one of which opens to a balcony so you can take full advantage of the warm weather), two bedrooms with two double beds each, and one bedroom with a queen bed. With dark wood furnishings, woven screens, colorful bedding and large windows, the bedroom suites have inviting tropical style.

The location of this luxury home in Los Suenos puts you within minutes of several things to do, from golf (a 3-minute drive away) to the beach, Playa Herradura (a 4-minute drive away). If you’d like to see more of the area, spend an afternoon at nearby Playa Jaco or Playa Blanco, or book a fishing expedition—the waters just off the resort are famous for it. You can also take a day trip to the city of San Jose, about 60 miles away. You’ll want to book your flights into Juan Santamaria International Airport, a 60-minute drive from Casa Puesta del Sol.

Copyright © 2016 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Find the luxury of a resort and the comforts of a private residence at Casita 21. Part of the Diamante Resort, this Los Cabos vacation rental is close to golf courses, a spa, and the property’s huge saltwater lagoon. Gorgeous outdoor living areas and four bedrooms mean that up to eight friends or family members can join you in the Baja sunshine.

The casita opens to its own terrace with a swimming pool, hot tub, lounging and dining areas, a barbecue and a firepit, all overlooking the Dunes Course and the ocean in the distance. After a day on the fairways or at the beach, watch a favorite show in the villa’s living room or post the best photos of your holiday via Wi-Fi.

Inside, the villa’s bright, spacious interiors create a relaxing ambience. Open the sliding glass doors to turn the open-concept great room and terrace into one indoor-outdoor living area, or close them and flip on the air conditioning on warmer days. The living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen are all open to each other, making it easy to spend time together.

Casita 21 has three bedrooms with king beds and terrace access, and one bedroom with two queen beds; all four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms. Like the common living areas, the bedrooms are bright and modern, with oversized windows, neutral tones and clean-lined furnishings.

Guests of the casita are welcome at the restaurants, golf course, fitness center, clubhouse and wellness center at Diamante—not to mention the showstopping 10-acre saltwater Crystal Lagoon. Spend days in the sunshine at nearby Diamante Beach; in the evenings, drive into Cabo San Lucas for a night on the town or San Jose del Cabo for a romantic stroll among the art galleries followed by a honeymoon-worthy dinner.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Overlooking Darkwood beach, this incredibly beautiful two-bedroom is the perfect destination for a family beach getaway or a romantic island honeymoon. On the southern coast of Antigua’s Jolly Harbour, the Tamarind Hills resort enjoys an amazing location between two of the island’s best beaches, as well as quick and easy access to golf, fine dining, beachfront bars, and the shops of Jolly Harbour.

This sleek and stylish villa features a classic color scheme, decorated with pure whites, deep wood tones, and exciting tropical accents. Both bedrooms, and the open concept living area, feature wide openings to the terrace, and breathtaking ocean view. Inside, you’ll love the villa’s state of the art tech features, designer furnishings, and top of the line appliances. Outside, the balconies are decorated with sun loungers, sitting and dining areas, and the refreshing infinity pool.

This Tamarind Hills suite comes with a fully equipped kitchen, formal and alfresco dining, a coffee machine, dishwasher, and barbecue. To keep you connected, the villa is outfitted with Wi-Fi and cable television. And, the entire apartment is air-conditioned. During your stay, you’ll have twenty-four-hour security, parking, and housekeeping, every other day.

Whether you’re in the mood for freshly caught lobster and cocktails on the beachfront or an elegant dining experience in one of the island’s best restaurants, you’ll find what you’re looking for within a few minutes of Tamarind Hills. For a laid-back evening watching the sunset from a beachfront bar, head to Dennis’s Bar or Jackie O’s, both just five minutes from home. For a special night of fine dining, Sheer Rocks is the spot, also just fine minutes away. If you’d like to visit some of Antigua’s historic sites, check out the English Harbour, where you’ll discover the island’s colonial past. And, if there’s a golfer in the group, Cedar Valley and Jolly Harbour golf clubs are both just five minutes from Tamarind Hills.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Experience Costa Rica’s famed pura vida in an eco-friendly way at Su Casa. Set on a hill with views of Playa Rajada in Guanacaste, the contemporary two-bedroom villa was constructed from indigenous woods and is surrounded by forest. Sleek interiors lined with floor-to-ceiling windows let the stunning views be the center of attention.

The villa is surrounded by a deck with an infinity-edge plunge pool, charcoal grill, outdoor shower and chaise longues. Guests also have access to a shared fitness facility and tennis court, and Wi-Fi is available in the welcome center during its opening hours. For comfort and convenience, Su Casa has air-conditioned bedrooms and a washer and dryer.

With wood-framed floor-to-ceiling windows and doors and a vaulted, beamed ceiling, Su Casa feels like a contemporary cabin. Sleek polished concrete floors in the open-plan living room, dining room and kitchen are warmed up by a cozy curved sectional, Danish-inspired upholstered chairs, a plush area rug and a honey-toned wood dining set. A generous island in the well-equipped kitchen is topped by a gorgeously textured waterfall-style wood countertop.

The villa’s two bedrooms each have an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, ceiling fan, iPod dock and balcony. The master bedroom has a queen bed and surround sound system. The second bedroom also has a queen bed , as well as a built-in bunk bed perfect for children. As in the common areas, textures of concrete, wood and white linen create a relaxed, modern feel.

Be sure to bring your racquets and workout gear; the Oceansite Facility tennis court and gym are just a 5-minute walk from Su Casa. Hop in the car for the 5-minute drive to the sands of Playa Rajada. It’s a 25-minute drive to a grocery store, clinic and the town of La Cruz, and a 90-minute drive to a hospital and the international airport in Liberia.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
From touchdown to takeoff, you’ll be well taken care of at this fully-staffed Beverly Hills-style home in Playa del Carmen. Start your morning with a squash match, a workout, or a stroll along Playacar Beach. In the afternoon, snap a few photos at the Mayan Ruins of Tulum before heading home for an alfresco dinner. After, grab a drink at the fully-stocked honor bar and relax by the moonlit pool. 

Just like the mansions of Beverly Hills, this architecturally astounding home is the perfect combination of relaxing beach vibes and chic, Hollywood glamour. From the wrap-around pool to the spiralling staircase, and everywhere in-between, Villa Aqua loves to show off its curves. The sunny living room, with a ceiling so high it’s totally fine to have a full-size palm tree in it, is the perfect place to gather with good friends. Set your focus on having fun while the private chef, butler, housekeepers, and more, take care of everything else. Take the party outside and open another bottle of wine. If you’re craving a late-night snack, fire up the barbecue and grill up some fresh seafood. 

The golfer in your group will surely notice the beautiful fairways of Hard Rock Campo de Golf that run through Aqua’s gated community. After a morning round, head out for brunch in Centro Playa del Carmen, there are a few great spots on the streets just off the beach. While you’re there, check out the bars and nightclub options for later. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description:
Though Seahorse Villa has an incredible location on a stretch of white sand and turquoise water, it’s more than just a beachfront getaway. This luxury townhouse is part of the Palm Cay gated community, an exclusive Bahamas retreat with a range of amenities from oceanfront pools and cabanas to a full-service deep-water marina. Reserve this well-appointed four-bedroom property for a tropical escape with friends or a relaxed island holiday with family.

This stunning vacation rental also has its own private outdoor living spaces for lounging or entertaining, featuring sitting and dining areas, a barbecue and an al-fresco shower only steps from the beach.

The villa’s 2,000 square feet of living space in building 3 are centered around an open-plan great room with a dining area at the front, a fully equipped kitchen in the middle and a sitting area that opens to the terrace closest to the beach. Watery hues are a nod to the ocean just outside, while modern furnishings keep the look fresh.

Seahorse Villa has two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms: a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a king bed and its own balcony facing the beach, and a second bedroom with a queen bed. The other two bedrooms share a bathroom and, with a queen bed and two twin beds, respectively, are perfect for a family traveling with children.

From the villa’s seaside setting, it’s only a 15-minute drive to the nearest shopping, dining and nightlife. Avid golfers won’t want to miss the chance to play a round on the Ocean Club course, 25 minutes away, during their stay in Nassau and Paradise Island. When it’s time to leave, the international airport is only 35 minutes away—meaning you can keep your toes in the sand almost right up until your flight.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Azure, cerulean, teal, sapphire—see all the shades of blue from the veranda of this classic Caribbean home in the lush hills of St. Martin’s quiet Mont Choisy area. The only thing interrupting the vistas of sea, sky, and pool is a sun-kissed terrace stocked with loungers and studded with the occasional palm tree. More palm trees ring intimate Happy Bay Beach, a 10-minute walk downhill.

You’ll be welcomed to this vacation rental by a transfer, breakfast basket, and the sea stretching to the horizon over a swimming pool, plunge pool, and hot tub on the terrace. Work up a sweat in the well-equipped gym and infrared sauna, pour a glass from the wine cooler for refreshment, and share photos of your holiday over Wi-Fi.

Glass walls and a pass-through invite the views and the breeze inside the house. The wood-paneled veranda roof soars up to a vaulted ceiling over the living area and a fully equipped kitchen with good-enough-to-eat cherry-red cabinets in a high gloss. Just through the kitchen is a dining area that’s walled on one side, open to the vistas on the other.

This luxury property has three bedrooms with king beds, two of which have their own private entrances, and one bedroom with two twin beds that can be connected to the master king bedroom for a family traveling with younger children. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.

Drive 5 minutes into Grand Case to shop or pick up takeout, then tote a picnic on the 10-minute walk to Happy Bay Beach, whose clothing-optional shores are perfect for couples wanting to relive their honeymoon, and Friars Bay Beach, a kid-friendly spot that also has a beach bar. It’s also 15 minutes or less to shopping and dining along Orient Bay Beach and in Marigot, the capital of the French side of the island.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Spend a quintessential Cancun holiday at the welcoming Villa 910. Not only does this six-bedroom vacation rental have space for up to twelve guests, it looks out over the brilliant waters of the Riviera Maya from a great location in the Zona Hotelera. Relax on the beach just in front of this luxury property or explore local attractions from the El Rey ruins to the Museo Sensorial del Tequila.

Guests of the villa are welcome to relax in a shared heated pool or the private, unheated plunge pool. For the kids, the villa has a games room with air hockey and foosball tables; for the grown-ups, there’s a charcoal barbecue outside and an Apple TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi inside.

Villa 910 is laid out around an open-concept great room with a comfortable sitting area, a dining table with seating for ten, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. The laid-back furniture contrasts beautifully with dramatic stone floors, turquoise walls that echo the color of the sea and vibrant artwork, including a playful grasshopper print.

The villa has one master bedroom with a king bed, three bedrooms with queen beds, one bedroom with two double beds and one bedroom with two twin beds. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans, and open to furnished balconies.

Whether you’re on a getaway with friends, vacationing with family or reliving your honeymoon, you’ll find plenty to see and do in Cancun—much of it close to Villa 910. If you’re here for the beach, stroll on the sand just outside or visit the playground at Playa Delfines. Other attractions nearby range from the El Rey archaeological site and the Museo Maya de Cancun to the thrills of the Wet’n Wild water park.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description:
Spend sunny days and moonlit nights in the Spanish Colonial charm of Casa Rio de Luna. Perched on a hillside in the exclusive Rancho Cerro Colorado community, this exquisite Los Cabos vacation rental commands views of the Sea of Cortez and the sands of Playa Palmilla. Its location also means you’re close to beaches, golf, and the restaurants and galleries in downtown San Jose del Cabo.

Savor the Mexico sun and ocean views from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, hot tub, loungers and al-fresco dining for eight. Serve refreshments from the barbecue and wet bar, then linger under the stars around the pool table and firepit. Inside, you’ll find luxury amenities ranging from a games room and second wet bar to a satellite TV and Wi-Fi.

Casa Rio de Luna will charm you from the moment you walk through its mission-style entry. Two sweeping staircases curve around a living area with double-height windows framing sea views. The adjacent dining room is a cozy space with brick ceilings, and the kitchen is fully equipped.

The villa has four bedrooms with king beds, one of which has honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as a jetted tub, and one of which has a private entrance. There are also two bedrooms with two queen beds each. All six bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and walk-in closets.

Whether you’re on holiday in Mexico with friends or family, you’ll find plenty to entertain around Casa Rio de Luna. For golfers, it’s a 10-minute drive or less to the Palmilla and Querencia golf courses; for sun-seekers, it’s 6 minutes or less by car to Punta Bella, Costa Azul and Palmilla beaches. Don’t miss the chance to wander between art galleries or sit down to a romantic dinner in San Jose del Cabo, a 10-minute drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Sandy Bottom is a spectacular beachfront villa in Turks and Caicos, situated in the Turtle Tail region on the south shore of Providenciales. The contemporary masterwork by local architect Ron Shaw was designed to maximize the sublime ocean views of the Caicos Banks, while its energy comes entirely from onsite solar panels. Ample outdoor living areas include a rooftop terrace, waterfront lounge, well-appointed kitchen, and infinity swimming pool. Four bedroom suites (a lofty master in the main house and three guest suites with entrances) accommodate eight guests.

The elevated pool stretches toward the turquoise panorama, with an exquisite sunbed perched at its extremity. The adjoining pavilion features a superb grill and swim-up bar, while the nearby table seats eight for alfresco meals. Lounge chairs are positioned by the pool and on the tiered terraces, beckoning you to long hours in the Caribbean sun. Descending to the beach, you'll discover secluded hammocks and a lounge with fire pit. At sunset, gather on the roof terrace to behold the sublime, 360-degree views.

The luminous interior living areas open directly to the veranda, pool terrace, and back balcony, infusing the home with natural light and extraordinary views of the sea and island. The lounge features a high-end retractable TV, allowing you to watch your favorite shows or simply admire the vistas. The stunning kitchen features chef-grade appliances and a large breakfast bar, and the dining table seats ten beside an expansive glass wall opening to the terrace. Air conditioning and ceiling fans keep the atmosphere cool, and there is also a lovely office with an inspiring vantage.

The master suite (atop the main house) enjoys a wrap-around balcony and breathtaking ocean views through three glass walls, while its ensuite bathroom includes a dual vanity and alfresco shower. The three guest suites feature ensuite bathrooms and direct access to the pool area. All of the bedrooms include safes, closets, and TVs.

From this private setting, you're just five minutes from town and an easy drive to Provo Golf Club, Turks & Caicos Island Tennis Club, and Grace Bay Beach. Princess Alexandra National Park is just seven kilometers away. Proximity to Providenciales International Airport makes Sandy Bottom a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
One of our top Barbados vacation rentals for a family vacation, this high-end luxury home in the gated community of Sandy Cove is not to be missed. Known as “Little England,” the island of Barbados combines British charm and Caribbean flair and is a popular gateway for visitors looking for sun, tranquil waters and vibrant nightlife.

Enjoy a morning coffee on one of the plush patio furnishings while soaking in the warm tropical air and views of the sea from the balcony. Cool down during the warm midday sun in the private plunge pool located on the far corner of the terrace. Meanwhile, after a day of exploring, sit down with your guests at the outdoor dining table and enjoy an alfresco meal.

The interior of this luxury villa is modern with minimalist decor, contemporary accents and Italian-style furnishings. The spacious living room boasts a U-shaped brown leather couch, surrounding a wooden coffee table and a large flatscreen television for evening entertainment. From here, you’ll have easy access to the terrace and will still enjoy views of the sea. The slick kitchen is divided from the living space by a breakfast bar and is equipped with all the appliances you need to craft a great meal in.

The villa includes three spacious bedrooms, two having king size beds and the other featuring two large bunk beds making it an ideal choice for a family vacation. All the bedrooms feature comfortable sleeping accommodations, private en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.

You and your guests will have access to all the amenities in the gated complex including the wonderful sun terrace, free form pool, wonderfully kept gardens, sauna and gym as well as 24-hour security and housekeeping services. Just steps away from the unit you’ll find unrivalled platinum sand beaches where you can enjoy plenty of time in the sun and surf.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
See both sides of the Riviera Maya at Puerto Estate. Made up of two villas in contrasting styles, Casa Del Agua and Villa Zacil Na, this beachfront vacation rental has nine bedrooms and space for up to eighteen guests. Reserve the property for a laid-back family reunion or to celebrate a milestone birthday or anniversary with all of your friends.

Guests of Puerto Estate enjoy the luxury of pampering from a chef, butler and housekeeper, plus oceanfront living areas with two swimming pools, lounging and dining areas, a barbecue, and beach chairs and umbrellas. High-tech amenities such as satellite television, a sound system and Wi-Fi make it easy to catch the game, set the mood or stay in touch while on holiday.

Though Casa Del Agua and Villa Zacil Na sit side by side in a gorgeous setting by the ocean, they show off two distinct sides of Mexican architecture. Casa Del Agua takes its inspiration from tradition, with a thatched roof and simple yet stylish built-in seating. Villa Zacil Na, by contrast, is a contemporary showpiece with sleek stone floors. Both villas, however, have fully equipped kitchens.

There are four bedrooms at Casa Del Agua, all of which have king beds, and five bedrooms at Villa Zacil Na: four with king beds and one with two twin beds. All nine bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ceiling fans, and two of the Zacil Na bedrooms even have honeymoon-suite-worthy jetted tubs.

Spend your stay exploring the waters just in front of Puerto Estate with the provided snorkel equipment, flotation devices and kayaks. It’s also an easy walk to the beach, the golf club, a tennis court, a grocery store and the Puerto Aventuras marina, where you can set off on a sailing or fishing excursion.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description:
Sandy Shore Villa House presents sweeping ocean views from almost every room. This luxurious four-bedroom villa is found at Turtle Tail, a picturesque and peaceful part of Providenciales away from the crowds. A long rustic path leads you directly to your private stretch of white sandy beach where the turquoise Atlantic awaits. Take a break from the real world and enjoy a peaceful retreat you’ll never forget.

The clear, shallow waters off you private beach are ideal for swimming and snorkeling. Push out on your kayaks and explore the five nearby islands that inspire the villa’s name. Spend easy afternoons relaxing on the large pool terrace, a bona fide oasis surrounded by lush tropical plants and flowers. Enjoy the Caribbean sun from a chaise longue or cool off with a dip in the soak pool. Escape the afternoon heat under the shelter of a scenic pergola. Watch the sun set over the horizon, but don’t think it’s time to head inside yet: light the barbecue and savor a starlight supper at your charming al fresco dining table.

The interior is decorated in the traditional West Indies plantation style, with dark wood and rattan furnishings, plus lofty exposed-beam ceilings. French doors and sliding glass walls invite the refreshing trade winds inside, complimenting the central air-conditioning. The spacious great room is divided in two by elegant circular columns. On one side you’ll find a decadently soft living room set, facing a flatscreen TV. On the other side, a long dark-wood dining table and fully-equipped kitchen await your culinary creativity.

The villa’s four beautifully-appointed bedrooms feature hand-selected furniture, soft linens, air conditioning and enclosed en-suites. Each room opens onto either a side patio or the pool terrace. The large Master suite includes an elegant four-poster bed and three sets of French doors leading outside. The second and third bedrooms are Queen suites and both look out to the spectacular Juba Salina inlet. The final bedroom contains a traditional West Indies style wood bed frame.

Sandy Shore Villa privacy and tranquility, but when you’re ready for adventure, you’ll find it just ten minutes away in Grace Bay. There you’ll find more beaches as well as restaurants shopping and nightlife. Take a tour of the reef protected wonders of Princess Alexandra Marine Park and keep your eyes peeled for the island’s most famous resident: Jo Jo the dolphin.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Welcome to Kaiku, arguably the most exceptional gated estate in Cayman Kai. This sprawling 5-6 bedroom/4.5 bath villa, with 2 bed/2 bath guesthouse, is bordered by a sixteen-foot fishtail palm privacy hedge, electric gated driveway and vacant lots on either side. Staying at Kaiku provides the utmost of privacy since the home is not visible from the road or gate. Situated on a quiet cove in Cayman Kai, guests will enjoy calm waters, excellent paddle-boarding and minimal wind in the winter. For barefoot ocean swimming, guests will want to visit the Rum Point Club, a mere 300 yards up the street. The Kaibo Marina and restaurants are also only a short 5-10 minute walk away. Accommodations for sixteen and benefits from Silver Thatch Guest Services make it an excellent choice for families or large groups of friends seeking a stylish and private alternative to a hotel or resort.

This luxurious estate is a perfect getaway for a large active family or 5 adult couples. The estate has a large freshwater pool, heated spa, large private dock and a screened porch. The pool deck has a cabana for shade, plus an outdoor BBQ area complete with sink, fridge and ice maker. 2 outdoor showers can be found on the boat dock and just off the pool deck.

One of Kaiku's best features is the exceptionally large private dock and four floating jet ski berths. If you rent a boat or jet skis, you can moor just behind the house. If you arrange a chartered sail or snorkel trip you can simply be picked up off your own private beach! No trips to the public docks necessary. The beach and calm cove are ideal for a rented Hobie cat as well. The owner provides 2 tandem kayaks for complimentary use with a signed waiver. Additional paddleboards and kayaks are available on-site for discount rental with a signed waiver*.

Those who have visited the Hawaiian Islands will feel right at home, especially at night when the grounds are illuminated with tiki torches on the beach and a lighting system that rivals Disneyworld's Polynesian Resort. The property is lovingly maintained by a non-resident groundskeeper who tends the beach M-W-F and is available to assist guests as well.

The main 5 bedroom house features clean, vaulted architecture, plenty of large windows, a modern kitchen with gas cooktop, 2 washers and dryers, 2 refrigerators, 5 flat screen TVs with HD cable programming, central A/C, a home security system with exterior cameras, an interior/exterior sound system and lighting system. The ground floor waterfront media room opens out to the pool deck and beach.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

listing.listing_description:
Overlooking a lush jungle-canopy leading to endless views of the Pacific, this French-inspired tropical paradise is nestled between Nicaragua and Panama in Santa Teresa. Swing open shuttered-windows and doors to invite sea breeze and sunlight inside. Do a little reading under the shade of palm trees or work on your tan in a poolside lounger. Then, head to the 4 amazing beaches along the peninsula.

Using ‘50s France as inspiration, this vintage-chic villa boasts an eclectic collection of unique furniture and a dazzling color palette. Each bedroom, and all common spaces, open to a terrace or private balcony, as well as the ocean view. The wall-length kitchen enhances the open concept interior, surely inviting a social atmosphere that will make group dinners, pool parties, and barbeques even more enjoyable.

Test out your bartending skills behind the counter on the terrace. Crafting tropical mixtures as friends and loved ones pull up a stool under the shaded overhang. Fire up the grill and add a casual dinner to the equation. After, play a round of bocce before the sunsets. Then, settle into the outdoor lounge to watch the show. Daily housekeeping will take care of the aftermath.

Rather party with the locals? Head to Malpais for a beachfront dance party at Coco Loco, the areas most popular bar. The next morning, continue the French-theme at The Bakery, serving delicious French breakfasts. For dinner, Product C is a local treasure that showcases incredibly fresh seafood and local produce.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Bedroom 3: 2 Double size beds, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower, Air conditioning, Ceiling fan, Direct access to terrace, Ocean view

listing.listing_description:
Live out your childhood dreams—while treating yourself to some grown-up luxury—at Tree House. As its name suggests, this Riviera Nayarit vacation rental sits amid the lush canopy just outside Sayulita, perched high enough to have views of the ocean. Its three bedrooms can accommodate eight friends or a small family, or you can reserve them for a honeymoon-like escape with just one special someone.

Look out over the forest to the water from furnished outdoor living areas with a hot tub, shower and a dining table for four. If you’d like to explore beyond the villa, a golf cart and two paddleboards are provided. And after a day of exploring, a streaming TV, surround-sound system and Wi-Fi will help you relax.

From its palapa-style roof to the massive tree trunks running through its center, Tree House truly feels like part of its surroundings. Two walls of windows frame the central open-concept great room, and if you’d like, you can slide the walls back to open the living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen to the breeze.

The villa has two bedrooms with king beds, private en-suite bathrooms and honeymoon-suite-worthy al-fresco showers. Both king bedrooms open to balconies, and one has partial ocean views. The third bedroom has two twin bunk beds, its own balcony and access to a hall bathroom.

Guests of Tree House are welcome to take advantage of the shared amenities at the Punta Sayulita Beach Club, just a 2-minute drive from the villa. It’s also a short drive to quiet but beautiful Playa de Los Muertos, plus shopping and dining in laid-back Sayulita Village. If you’d like a little more excitement on your holiday, plan to tee off at nearby Pacifico Litibú Golf Course or spend a night out in Puerto Vallarta.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this home is in close proximity to an ongoing construction project. For more information, contact us.

listing.listing_description:
Make your mark on famed Grace Bay Beach at Footprints on the Beach. Set on the exclusive Tranquility Lane on the beach’s eastern end, the six-bedroom villa has extensive outdoor spaces and 100 feet of oceanfront on Grace Bay Beach.

The villa is surrounded by an acre of landscaped grounds, and opens to a backyard with pool, terrace, fire pit and beach. Spend the day using the snorkel and swimming, playing on the outdoor pool table or ping pong table, relaxing on the beach chairs or hammock, then rinse off in one of the two outdoor showers.  You will enjoy the services of your very own private chef creating delicious delicacies from his extensive repertoire. Any three daily meals prepared for you (groceries extra) or be catered by the on-staff butler. Gather around the fire pit to watch the stars or, if it’s a warm evening, retreat inside to the central air conditioning and satellite television.

Footprints has recently undergone a change in ownership and just completed (Nov 2018) a multimillion-dollar renovation to both the interior and exterior.  The villa has been professionally decorated with all new contemporary furnishings, a new kitchen and a chef kitchen with an open design on the main floor.

Each of the villa’s six bedrooms has a full en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, satellite television, ceiling fan and is stocked with bathrobes and toiletries. There are five bedrooms with king beds (one wheelchair accessible bedroom), and one bedroom with two bunk beds (4 beds).  There are two high chairs and two cribs available for the youngest guests.

Though Footprints on the Beach is tucked away from the bustle of the island’s resort area, it’s just 3.2 km by car to the golf course, and 4.8 km to grocery stores, a tennis court, the Salt Mills shopping area and downtown. Have dinner and drinks at the restaurants and bars along the busier areas of Grace Bay, then enjoy a quiet evening back on your own private stretch of sand.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Read more about Footprints on the Beach in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/2014/07/beachfront-villa-on-turks-and-caicos/)
